markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 340 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodline**
[Elemental](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=6)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature touched
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You repel effects that would hinder a creature or slow its movement. While under this spell's effect, the target ignores effects that would give them a circumstance penalty to Speed. When they attempt to Escape an effect that has them immobilized, grabbed, or restrained, they automatically succeed unless the effect is magical and of a higher level than the _freedom of movement_ spell.
name: Freedom of Movement

<traits>

<additional-info>

---

<summary>
A creature overcomes hindrances to its movement.
</summary>
summary: A creature overcomes hindrances to its movement.
summary_markdown: A creature overcomes hindrances to its movement.
text: Freedom of Movement Source Core Rulebook pg. 340 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Primal Bloodline Elemental Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 creature touched Duration 10 minutes --- You repel effects that would hinder a creature or slow its movement. While under this spell's effect, the target ignores effects that would give them a circumstance penalty to Speed. When they attempt to Escape an effect that has them immobilized, grabbed, or restrained, they automatically succeed unless the effect is magical and of a higher level than the freedom of movement spell.
